parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch points in this sketch

title: ISketch.IGetSketchPoints2
description: Gets the sketch points in this sketch.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch points in this sketch

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of sketch points in this sketch VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISketch::GetSketchPointsCount2
before calling this method to get the number of sketch points in this sketch.
